snippet: Beating Serena Williams at the Australian Open may have taken a toll on Sloane Stephens, but she is back in the fourth round of her favorite tournament, the French Open.
abstract: Sloane Stephens beats Marina Erakovic at the French Open and moves on to the quarterfinals; it is the first time since the 2004 United States Open that four American women reached the Round of 16 in a Grand Slam tournament.
lead_paragraph: Beating Serena Williams at the Australian Open may have taken a toll on Sloane Stephens, but she is back in the fourth round of her favorite tournament, the French Open.

headline.seo: Sloane Stephens Stays Poised at French Open
headline.main: Stephens Rides Out an Early Stumble
headline.print_headline: Stephens Rides Out Early Stumble, This One on the Court
